DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine safety effectiveness device ( KC-002 interactive wound dress ) promotion heal diabetic foot ulcer compare conventional wound therapy regimen subject Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus . This prospective , randomize , multi-center , unmasked , control study . All patient receive care diabetic foot ulcer study . Participation study 24 week .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Interactive Wound Dressing ( KC002 ) Treatment Diabetic Foot Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Participants include study must : Have Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus Have diabetic foot ulcer bottom foot heal present three ( 3 ) week less two ( 2 ) year sufficient size qualify study Be able visit study doctor regularly 24 week Participants may include : The diabetic foot ulcer infect They poor circulation study foot Can wear special boot take pressure study ulcer They certain disease laboratory value within specify range
